item.title: Bachelor's Degree Capstone Project: Incident Response Plan part 5
item.description: The following is part 5 of the Incident Response Plan that I submitted as my final capstone project for my BS in CyberSecurity at Colorado Technical University, and was originally written March 18, 2018. I decided to publish it to demonstrate the work I’ve done, as well as in the hope that someone will get some benefit from it. Table of Contents Part 1 - “Abstract,” “Background,” & “Policies, Procedures, Roles, and Responsibilities”
